sentences.sContent: The central bank said interest rates would remain on hold at 0 to 0.25 per cent for an “extended period” and it would continue to reinvest in its securities portfolio.
sentences.sContent_eng: The central bank said interest rates would remain on hold at 0 to 0.25 per cent for an “extended period” and it would continue to reinvest in its securities portfolio.
sentences.sCn: 美联储表示，利率将在“相当长一段时间”内继续维持在零到0.25%的水平，而且它将继续将投资所得再投资于它的证券组合。

remMethod.val: re(再) + invest(投资) → 再投资

trans.tranOther: to use money you have earned from  investment s  to buy additional investments
